text: Is there a way to tell Documenter to fail if my `@repl` / `@example` blocks throw exceptions? I don't need a full doctest, but I still want my build pipelines to fail if my sample code has a typo.

elements.text: Is there a way to tell Documenter to fail if my
blocks throw exceptions? I don't need a full doctest, but I still want my build pipelines to fail if my sample code has a typo.

text: I thought that was default. Perhaps you need `strict=true`?
